content: Define the module named TopModule with input ports a (8 bits) and b (8 bits), and output ports s (8 bits) and overflow.
source:
I would like you to implement a module named TopModule with the following interface. All input and output ports are one bit unless otherwise specified.

 - input  a (8 bits)
 - input  b (8 bits)
 - output s (8 bits)
 - output overflow

content: Implement the addition logic for the 8-bit 2's complement numbers a and b to produce the output s.
source: Assume that you have two 8-bit 2's complement numbers, a[7:0] and b[7:0]. The module should add these numbers to produce s[7:0].

content: Implement the logic to compute whether a signed overflow has occurred during the addition of a and b.
source: Also compute whether a (signed) overflow has occurred.
